title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files do not appear in the File menu Most Recently Used (MRU) list.
EB: These files should be persisted between sessions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
